name: whook
description: Build strong and efficient REST web services.

scripts.coveralls: node --harmony ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel/register src/*.mocha.js tests/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cover: ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --report html ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel/register src/*.mocha.js tests/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000

author: Nicolas Froidure
